title: Income Statement Generator
description: A single-page application (SPA) that allows you to generate an income statement for your business. The application is built using Vue3 (Composition API, Pinia), PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap.

title: Data Management System
description: Web-based Data Management System for a Company in the Construction Sector. The system has the ability to bring in data from numerous CSV files, clean the data, and eliminate any duplicates. It can also gather extra data by utilizing third-party API services.

title: Shore Steps Calculator
description: This project is designed to assist individuals in calculating the appropriate dimensions and quantity of shore steps needed based on the size of a hill. Moreover, in addition to providing essential calculations, this program generates a visual representation of the calculated shore steps in the form of an SVG image.

title: Website for Pallet Liquidation Company
description: The website provides three different options for customers to purchase pallets: Buy Now, Auction, and Offline sales at the warehouse. The project was built using the Flask framework (Python). The real-time bidding achieved through the use of WebSockets.

title: Over 100 websites for Russian Companies
description: I have developed over a hundred websites for Russian companies, including small and medium-sized businesses. The backend of these websites is written in PHP and MySQL, and I developed my own framework to use. Each site has its own admin page, allowing clients to easily update their websites on their own. The HTML code is optimized for search engines, ensuring that the websites are easily discoverable through search.

title: Website 101ru.com
description: Website Russia in Pictures provides users with a unique perspective on Russia. The site was built using the Laravel 9 framework, PHP, and MySQL database.

title: Demo Project
description: The project involves importing an XML file from a remote source, parsing the data contained in the file, and adding the parsed data to a database. The data can then be displayed to the user with options to sort and filter the data based on various criteria. Read more

title: K5Calc - Simple Windows Keyboard Calculator
description: K5Calc is a simple Windows keyboard calculator built with Python and the Tkinter framework. It allows you to perform basic arithmetic calculations using only your keyboard. For lexing and parsing, the SLY library was used

title: Personal Resume Website
description: The website functions as an online representation of my resume, providing information regarding my experience, skills, education, interests, and other details about myself.
